title: Geophila
text:
Geophila is a <a href="genus">genus</a> of <a href="Herbaceous%20plant">herbs</a> in the <a href="Family%20%28biology%29">family</a> <a href="Rubiaceae">Rubiaceae</a>. This genus is <a href="pantropical">pantropical</a>, as it is found in most <a href="Tropics">tropical</a> regions.
The name Geophila was once applied to a genus of mushrooms (defined by <a href="Lucien%20Qu%C3%A9let">Lucien Quélet</a> in 1886 with the modern "<a href="Stropharia%20inuncta">Stropharia inuncta</a>" as type species), but this usage is now obsolete and illegitimate.
